verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] announce on Tuesday whether the U.S. will leave the 2015 Iran nuclear agreement , a signature achievement by his predecessor that he ’s long derided as “ the worst deal ever . ”

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: announce] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARG1: whether the U.S. will leave the 2015 Iran nuclear agreement , a signature achievement by his predecessor that he ’s long derided as “ the worst deal ever] . ”

President Donald Trump will announce on Tuesday whether the U.S. [V: will] leave the 2015 Iran nuclear agreement , a signature achievement by his predecessor that he ’s long derided as “ the worst deal ever . ”

President Donald Trump will announce on Tuesday whether [ARG0: the U.S.] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: leave] [ARG1: the 2015 Iran nuclear agreement] , a signature achievement by his predecessor that he ’s long derided as “ the worst deal ever . ”

President Donald Trump will announce on Tuesday whether the U.S. will leave the 2015 Iran nuclear agreement , a signature achievement by his predecessor that he [V: ’s] long derided as “ the worst deal ever . ”
